column2:
Summary of Functionals
Function Output Example
lapply(X, FUN) list lapply(mtcars, mean)
sapply(X, FUN) matrix OR list sapply(mtcars, mean)
apply(X, MARGIN, FUN) matrix apply(mtcars, 1, mean); apply(mtcars, 2, mean)
vapply(X, FUN, FUN.VALUE) matrix vapply(mtcars, mean, numeric(1))
mapply(FUN, ...) matrix mapply(rbind, mtcars\$mpg, mtcars\$wt)
Map(f, ...) list Map(rbind, mtcars\$mpg, mtcars\$wt)
eapply(env, FUN) list See ?eapply
rapply(object, f, classes) vector OR list rapply(iris, mean, classes = "numeric")
aggregate(formula, data, FUN data frame aggregate(mpg ~ gear, mtcars, mean)
